traits.Pounce: If the kamadan moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn that target must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. actions.Multiattack: The kamadan makes two attacks: one with its bite or claw and one with its snakes.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Snakes: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
